forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: a setting to have "persist states" on by default

comments.text: nothing is more frustrating than making some complex creation, only to realise that a part that is several sub-things deep automatically goes back to state 1 after 30s for...
... no reason just because you forgot to check off the box on every single part that makes them act like they should in the first place. it would be fantastic to have an option for
everything you create while the setting is active to have persistant states on by default. it would make creating complicated things much less frustrating

thread.latestCommentText: everything you create while the setting is active to have persistant states on by default. it would make creating complicated things much less frustrating
